title: The Complete Asimov By Isaac Asimov
creator: Issac Asimov
description: n these twenty-three stories, Asimov's vivid awareness of the potential of technology is translated into human dilemmas. T he ever-expanding popularity of his stories with young and old readers alike is explained by their wit, zest and human interest. Within this volume are stories often voted among the best science fiction stories of all time. In these stories Asimov's vivid awareness of the potential of technology is translated into human dilemmas that are more relevant today than ever before.
subject: Book
